body: Habituate the monkey to the primate chair
Train the monkey to the various motor tasks to assess manual dexterity daily. Duration of a behavioral session is 30-60 minutes
Establish during 2 months the pre-lesion behavioral scores
Perform the cervical hemi-section at C7
Place osmotic pump to deliver the antibody during 4 weeks
Immediately after the lesion, test daily the motor performance to establish the post-lesion behavioral scores \(2-3 months)
Injection of BDA at multiple sites in the contralesional motor cortex
Histology: sections \(50 microns thick) of the brain and spinal cord. Histochemistry.
